body: So I'm packing today and leaving tommorow for a couple days (4 days if I'm not mistaken) so I won't be on as often (my mom is bringing her laptop) so I will hop on the forums sometimes and hop in-game to check how things are going but I won't be on as often for the next 4 days, and mods don't ban me please cause my IP is probably going to be different, well it will be different sense were staying in a hotel so... ya cya,
